HediffDef.label: blink
HediffDef.description: A deformation of an unknown origin in the body part is causing colonist to periodically shift in and out of existance, reappearing at a different location, uncontrollably.

HediffDef.label: controllable blink
HediffDef.description: A deformation of an unknown origin in the body part is allowing colonist to shift in and out of existance, reappearing at a different location, at will. Colonist is not able to control where he'll reappear.

HediffDef.label: aimed blink
HediffDef.description: A deformation of an unknown origin in the body part is allowing colonist to shift in and out of existance, reappearing at a desired location, at will.
